ProjectTitle: Identification and characterization of biocontrol organisms and unraveling their mode of action to tackle Phytophthora cactorum in strawberry
InitialFeedbackHistory:
25/05/2023
You use many different storage solutions, is there a specific reason to use different locations rather than one solution with automatic backup? The storage guide can help you to choose: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Please note that RDR is a repository for data sharing (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr), not for preservation only. You describe NCBI for data sharing which is for your data more suitable than RDR, and you can also consider the European alternative EBI (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/). For data that like to share but is not suitable for these disciplinary repositories you can use RDR
label: good with suggestions
